title: Cloudinary MERN Image Upload
description: A full-stack image upload and management app using React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Cloudinary. Users can upload images, view them in a gallery, and delete images from both the database and cloud storage.

title: Chef Claude
description: An AI-powered recipe generator web app. Users enter ingredients, and the app uses Anthropic Claude via a secure Express backend to suggest markdown-formatted recipes. Features include dynamic ingredient management, dark/light theme toggle, and animated loading states.

title: E-commerce API
description: Production-ready Node.js + Express e-commerce API with JWT auth, role-based access control, and features for products, categories, cart, orders, and reviews.

title: React Feature Showcase
description: A multi-feature React app built with Vite and Tailwind CSS, demonstrating pagination, API integration, form validation, theme switching, modal popups, JSON diff viewer, and more.

title: MyMovieLog
description: A modern React app to search movies, view details, and track your watched list with ratings. Features include OMDB API integration, localStorage persistence, keyboard shortcuts, and a responsive UI.

title: URL Shortener
description: A full-stack URL shortening app with create, list, copy, and delete features.

title: Contact API with Authentication
description: Secure RESTful API using Node.js, Express, MongoDB (Mongoose) and JWT authentication. Supports user registration/login with hashed passwords and user-scoped CRUD for contacts.

title: Bank Account Management
description: A modern React-Redux banking app with transaction history, currency conversion, loan management, and persistent state using localStorage.

title: Password Generator
description: Simple client-side password generator using HTML, CSS and vanilla JavaScript (runs on Vite). Generates two passwords at once, allows copy-to-clipboard, and supports configurable length (6â€“32).

title: Metric/Imperial unit converter
description: A simple metric/imperial unit converter built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS; configured with Vite.
